message: Let's start fair. I propose a 51/49 split.  I think this is a good starting point.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a reasonable split.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still believe a slightly more even split is fair, considering the inflation. Let's go with 52/48 this time.
Inflation is taking its toll, I think 53/47 is a fair split at this point.
